name: @aily-project/board-xiao_esp32s3_plus
description: Seeed Studio XIAO ESP32S3 Plus, powered by ESP32-S3's 240MHz Xtensa 32-bit LX7 dual-core processor, brings more SMD pins to the tiny versatile XIAO ESP32S3. While maintaining all the powerful features including WiFi and BLE 5.0 wireless connectivities, 2.4GHz Rod antenna, and ultra-low power consumption of 14Î¼A in deep sleep mode with lithium battery charging management, the Plus variant features redesigned castellations and pad layout on the back, offering 9 additional GPIOs specifically for advanced Bluetooth projects requiring expanded I/Os via SMD board-to-board soldering. It's ideal for advanced IoT projects, Smart Homes, and professional wireless devices requiring extra I/O connectivity.
author: Seeed
